default.description: The Swedish Kelly list is a freely available frequency-based vocabulary list that comprises general-purpose language of modern Swedish. The list was generated from a large web-acquired corpus (SweWaC) of 114 million words dating from the 2010s. It is adapted to the needs of language learners and contains 8,425 most frequent lemmas that cover 80% of SweWaC.
